## How to install

* Make sure your instance is up and running on latest dev branch.
  * `git pull origin dev`
  * `make fresh`
* Update the HDBT theme
  * `composer require drupal/hdbt:dev-UHF-0000_insert_correct_branch`
* Run `make drush-cr`
